channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiDeceptor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiDeceptor

item.title: CVE-2022-30302|2024-10-22T20:55:58.209Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortideceptor
item.description: Multiple relative path traversal vulnerabilities [CWE-23] in FortiDeceptor management interface 1.0.0 through 3.2.x, 3.3.0 through 3.3.2, 4.0.0 through 4.0.1 may allow a remote and authenticated attacker to retrieve and delete arbitrary files from the underlying filesystem via specially crafted web requests.
